regression package¶

Submodules¶

regression.ingest_data module¶

regression.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)¶

Returns score on test dataset.

Args:

housing_url: Path to download housing url housing_path: Path to store housing dataset

Returns:

returns None value

regression.ingest_data.income_cat_proportions(data)¶

Returns score on test dataset.

Args:

data: Pandas object which has housing object

Returns:

returns a pandas object income category count

regression.ingest_data.load_housing_data(housing_path)¶

Returns score on test dataset.

Args:

housing_path: Path where housing dataset is present

Returns:

returns a pandas object which has housing data

None
